name: Mugger
description:
A game about trying to avoid the sleep sheep, and staying up to mug :)

Inspired by the concepts of the classic Space Invaders and Breakout games.

Instructions:

Use left and right arrows on keyboard to toggle pencil paddle. Press 'spacebar' to launch your coffee bean!

Might add more credits here if I missed out in the credits list in-game

Recommended to be full screen to see the entire UI. Will go and fix it in future updates.
